chart_description: The Netdata Workers Busy Time chart shows the percentage of time all workers are busy processing ACLK queries. ACLK is a clickstream processing and analysis tool built on top of Netdata.

dimension_descriptions.average: The average busy time percentage of all workers during the sampling interval.
dimension_descriptions.max: The maximum busy time percentage among all workers during the sampling interval.
dimension_descriptions.min: The minimum busy time percentage among all workers during the sampling interval.
